name: cerebras/SlimPajama-627B
description: The SlimPajama dataset, developed by Cerebras, is a significant contribution to the field of natural language processing. It is a cleaned and deduplicated version of Together's RedPajama, consisting of 59,166 JSONL files and occupying approximately 895GB of storage when compressed. This dataset offers a vast and diverse text corpus, making it an invaluable resource for training large-scale language models.
citeAs: @misc{cerebras2023slimpajama,   author = {Soboleva, Daria and Al-Khateeb, Faisal and Myers, Robert and Steeves, Jacob R and Hestness, Joel and Dey, Nolan},   title = {{SlimPajama: A 627B token cleaned and deduplicated version of RedPajama}},   month = June,   year = 2023,   howpublished = {\url{https://www.cerebras.net/blog/slimpajama-a-627b-token-cleaned-and-deduplicated-version-of-redpajama}},   url = {https://huggingface.co/datasets/cerebras/SlimPajama-627B}, }
creator: cerebras
keywords: Text Data, Cleaned and Deduplicated, RedPajama
